Services

Advanced Data Analytics

Reach your full potential

Leverage advanced data analysis techniques and machine learning to unlock insights from your operational data. I help organizations use their data to identify optimization opportunities, predict equipment failures, and improve decision-making.

  • Machine learning model development
  • Predictive maintenance systems
  • Performance modeling and analysis
  • Data visualization and reporting

Advanced Process Control

Achieve optimum dynamic performance

Implement advanced process control (APC) solutions including Model Predictive Control (MPC) to optimize plant operations, reduce variability, and maximize throughput while maintaining product quality and equipment constraints.

  • MPC application design and implementation
  • Process control optimization
  • Dynamic process modeling
  • Control system performance assessment

Energy Optimization and Management

Control your variable costs

Develop comprehensive energy management strategies to reduce consumption, lower costs, and decrease emissions. I work with operations teams to identify energy efficiency opportunities and implement sustainable improvements.

  • Energy consumption analysis and baselining
  • Energy efficiency opportunity identification
  • Energy management system design
  • Emissions reduction strategies

Production Optimization

Mobilize your people and knowledge

Design and implement systematic production optimization programs that engage your operations teams and mobilize organizational knowledge to deliver sustainable performance improvements.

  • Production optimization program design
  • Throughput and yield improvement
  • Bottleneck analysis and debottlenecking
  • OEE improvement initiatives

Management Control and Reporting

Systematic data-driven improvement

Develop effective management control systems that provide actionable insights, enable data-driven decision-making, and support continuous improvement programs.

  • KPI framework development
  • Performance reporting systems
  • Operational data analysis
  • Management dashboard design
